messages.subject: Hijikata descendants.
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, you re right. They would be Kiroku s descendants. ( I would assume so anyway.) Is that pic of the woman with the child still in the files? That was one of
messages.messageBody:
Yes, you're right. They would be Kiroku's descendants. ( I would assume so
anyway.) Is that pic of the woman with the child still in the files? That was
one of them.

As for the child, I would love to know more about the source of that rumor as
well. Pretty sad if it's true and that the baby died. :(

-MissB
